title: Ranked Team Provisionals
body: We made a ranked team consisting of gold 4, plat 4, plat 3, plat 5, and dia 4, and won all 5 provisional games and got placed in bronze 1. I am pretty sure our elo or the enemy team elo were not this low. I wrote a letter to riot games to help me understand this situation but didn't really help. I really think this wasn't a fair result. Can someone please explain me clearly about this? Thanks.

replies.body:
Going 5-0 and getting Bronze 1 seems pretty crappy. But if you look at who you played against.

1st game: Silver players in a Bronze V ranked team
2nd and 3rd game were against the same team: Gold players in a Bronze IV team
4th and 5th game were against the same team: Gold/Plat players in an unranked team

Seems legit that you would get high bronze since your opponents were not really that good in terms of TEAM ranking

I see. But why would we be matched against low ranked teams? I don't think neither our individual nor team mmr aren't that low... 
Oh well I guess if we deserve higher we can get there easy haha. Thanks to your helpful reply! Thanks man :)
My guess is because this is OCE, not many ranked 5's team queing up.

My B1 ranked team vs an unranked team yesterday, 3 silvers a bronze and a MASTER tier player. It was the first game they played. Team ranked is very very strange in terms of placements and who you go up against. Unfortunately unless riot makes a better system to determine team MMR it will continue.

Thats not a bad thing, the ranked system in ranked 5's works differently then soloQ, if your constantly winning your games youll skip ALOT!

seen a team go from silver to diamond in less then 40 games.

Good luck man, all the best :)

The entry level ranking in ranked 5s is much lower than solo queue in my experience. Probably has something to do with the fact that you can make a new ranked 5s team so easily if you lose a few placements or start dropping too low. It wont take you very long to climb anyway, a team of mainly plats with half decent coordination will essentially never lose to bronze/silver/gold players
because ranked 5's mmr is different to soloq mmr.

^
This.

I reckon every single ranked team landed fairly low ranked after provisionals because regardless of your individual solo Q ranks, your team is effectively B5 until proven to be better after you continue to win..

Unless of course you happened to get matched against highly ranked teams in provisionals you would be placed higher from 5 wins.

Good luck angrymaori
That's a strange one considering all of your team members are of fairly high rank, what was Riots reasoning behind it?

Riot said: "Please know that the 2015 Season is a fresh start for everyone who plays ranked games. Your last season's performance carries weight, along with your placement matches, but this doesn't necessarily mean you will be placed in the same division you ended in last season.

We made some changes to the Leagues system this season that should allow players to more quickly reach the League that appropriately reflects their skill level. So, even if you didn't place in the division you expected, it's important to remember that this is your starting point for the season, not your final destination."

I do understand it but yea.. Bronze 1 seems pretty depressing :(
